00030 namespace uStreamLib {
00031         class US_API_EXPORT SharedHash : public Hash {
00032         public:
00036                 enum { 
00041                         HASH_BUSY = 100 };
00042 
00046                 SharedHash(void);
00047 
00051                 virtual ~SharedHash(void);
00052 
00057                 int32 init(uint32 hash_size);
00058 
00062                 int32 lock(void)
00063                 {
00064                         return _mutex.lock();
00065                 }
00066 
00070                 int32 unlock(void)
00071                 {
00072                         return _mutex.unlock();
00073                 }
00074 
00079                 int32 tryLock(void)
00080                 {
00081                         return _mutex.tryLock();
00082                 }
00083 
00087                 char* get(
00088                         char* key, // key to get
00089                         uint32 key_size, // key size in bytes
00090                         bool try_lock = false  // whether to lock or try a lock
00091                 );
00092 
00097                 char* get(char* key, bool try_lock = false)
00098                 {
00099                         return SharedHash::get(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1, try_lock);
00100                 }
00101 
00105                 char* get(
00106                         char* key, // key to get
00107                         uint32 key_size, // key size in bytes
00108                         uint32* val_size, // value size in bytes
00109                         bool try_lock = false  // whether to lock or try a lock
00110                 );
00111 
00115                 char* get(char* key, uint32* val_size, bool try_lock)
00116                 {
00117                         return SharedHash::get(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1, val_size,
00118                                         try_lock);
00119                 }
00120 
00124                 int32 put(
00125                         char* key, // key to put
00126                         uint32 key_size, // key size in bytes
00127                         char* val, // value to put (cast to char* may be needed)
00128                         uint32 val_size, // value size in bytes
00129                         bool replace = false, // whether to replace an existing key
00130                         bool try_lock = false   // whether to lock or try a lock
00131                 );
00132 
00137                 int32 put(char* key, char* val, uint32 val_size, bool replace = false,
00138                         bool try_lock = false)
00139                 {
00140                         return SharedHash::put(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1, val,
00141                                         val_size, replace, try_lock);
00142                 }
00143 
00148                 int32 pput(char* key, uint32 key_size, char* val,
00149                         bool replace = false, bool try_lock = false);
00150 
00156                 int32 pput(char* key, char* val, bool replace = false,
00157                         bool try_lock = false)
00158                 {
00159                         return SharedHash::pput(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1, val,
00160                                         replace, try_lock);
00161                 }
00162 
00166                 int32 del(
00167                         char* key, // key to remove
00168                         uint32 key_size, // key size in bytes
00169                         bool try_lock = false  // whether to lock or try a lock
00170                 );
00171 
00176                 int32 del(char* key, bool try_lock = false)
00177                 {
00178                         return SharedHash::del(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1, try_lock);
00179                 }
00180 
00184                 void clear(void)
00185                 {
00186                         MutexLocker ml(&_mutex); Hash::clear();
00187                 }
00188

00190                 // copy constructor not available

00193                 }
00194 
00195                 // table protection mutex
00196                 Mutex _mutex;
